Apartments are thoughtfully designed and socially engaging community with refined design features, open-concept floor plans, upscale amenities, and a location that puts you close to everywhere you want to be.
REFINED FEATURES
Wood-vinyl plank flooring throughout every home
Granite countertops throughout
Spacious undermount sinks in kitchens and bathrooms
Designer tile backsplashes and shaker-style cabinets in kitchens
Two cabinet color schemes
Stainless steel appliances including side-by-side refrigerators with in-door ice and water
Full-size washers and dryers in every home
Spacious walk-in closets in every home
*In select homes
DISTINCTIVE AMENITIES
Resident clubhouse with a kitchen, coffee bar, and TV
WiFi throughout all common areas
Conference room, work station, and a WiFi printer
Courtyard featuring a resort-style pool with tanning ledges and grilling stations
State-of-the-art athletic club with cardio and strength training equipment
Outdoor yoga space
Bike storage area with a repair station
On-site dog park
Controlled-access parking with carports and private garages
Fetch Package Delivery Service
Amenities, features and finishes are subject to change.
